#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main(){
int t;
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
int x,y,s;
int a,d,n;
cin>>x;
cin>>y;
cin>>s;

n=2*s/(x+y);
cout<<n<<endl;


d=(y-x)/(n-5);

a=x-2*d;
for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
{
cout<<a+i*d<<" ";
}
cout<<endl;





}
return 0;
}
